title: Final T - hot iron ball dropped into H20 at 50.C

content.question: A hot iron ball is dropped into a 200. g sample of water initially at 50°C. If 8.4 kJ of heat is transferred from the ball to the water, what is the final temperature of the water? (The specific heat of water is 4.2 J/(g·°C).)

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
